thread.title: Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text: I was first turned on to alpha Brain after I stopped taking my Adderall prescription due to lack of sleep and eating. I still needed something to help keep me focused. A friend showed my a Joe Rogan podcast talking about the product and I figured it couldn't hurt to try. I noticed recall and memory to be much more fluid. Focus was natural and no speeding or crashing like I was on my Adderall. No random outbursts of anger or multiple days without sleep. If you are thinking about buying don't and just do it right now.
